about_the_game:
The Proxima Centauri Campaign features the Proxima Centauri Star System! Beat those very difficult sectors and beat the boss in the end! Master this campaign and earn campaign stars!

Features:

Four celestial bodies:

Proxima Centauri A: 2x2 star

Proxima Centauri B: 2x2 planet

Proxima Centauri C: 2x2 planet

Proxima Centauri D: 2x2 planet (with a mothership boss)

Advantages:

  • You no longer have to own Proxima Centauri steam inventory items to play this campaign! If you own this DLC you can keep it to yourself forever!

  • Instant unlock! No download required

  • Earn a campaign gift from this DLC! (5000 credits, two 4X Multiplier)

  • Master this campaign and show your pride with campaign stars!

  • Support the developer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2300 Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 520 (or a GPU with at least 128MB VRAM)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Absolute Minimum Specs on Lowest which should get you around 60FPS
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14-24
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Tested on highest settings without major stuttering or lag
